# precisionRecall

**Instance Property**

A data table with the recall and precision for each item.

## Declaration

```swift
var precisionRecall: MLDataTable { get }
```

## Assessing the model

- **excludingObserved**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the recommender omitted training data from the recommendations.
- **precisionRecallDataFrame**: A data table with the recall and precision for each item.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the recommender omitted training data from the recommendations.
